:::Coming out of his just crashed stasis pod defection says:::
"By the Pit I landed in the perfect spot!"
:::Turning on his broadcaster he says:::
"calling all bots, be you friend or foe come and join me, together we will 
destroy all the fractions! how ever joins me will help me rule this planet 
the way it should be ruled! Free of war and evil and filled with true peace 
and harmony!"
:::He then finds a cave and waits... for his first costomer:::
